name: Simple-ajax-search
tagline: A django based ajax/jquery search app...
body:
simple-ajax-search ================== -A django based ajax search, without reloading the template.
-Automatically searches the database as you type the search word.
Tools used:
*Django 1.4.3
*Jquery and Ajax
*Twitter bootstrap
A live demo can be found here:
http://simpleajaxsearch.herokuapp.com/
Feel free to fork, modify and maybe raise any issue..
Regards,
Benarito.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
